column4: I use paltalk and I want to play rythmbox in the room without microphone how can do that,i'm using paltalk express on debian squeeze ?any suggestion?
and what are you trying to do with it exactly?
i want to play music in the rooms without taking the mic,
is paltalk configured to use pulseaudio?
i want to play music directly from my soundblaster without the mic
pulseaudio causes error in my squeeze box
I guess I'm not understanding. Are you trying to play music on a second soundcard?
something like using the line in,but not exactly
I'd look into using pulse audio again, but you can use an alsa passthrough command (I can't find it right now) for your squeeze box. Pulse will make it fairly easy for two audio cards
maybe u can help me with getting rid of this error in pulseaudio
pulseaudio says error connection refused and it dies
I'd help more, but I have to leave actually.
try asking a PA question to the room and they may be able to help
